title: Scrollbars are enabled in ImageAnalyzer example but have no effect
description: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.2 and GTK2, the scrollbars are enabled. However, they do not have any effect. This can be observed when opening a small image, such as an icon, where the scrollbars are misleading as they do not perform any action.
OB: Scrollbars are enabled in ImageAnalyzer example but have no effect
EB: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
SR:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Observe the enabled scrollbars.
3. Attempt to use the scrollbars on a small image.
4. Notice that the scrollbars do not have any effect.
